name: max_rev
description: Програма повинна знайти найбільший елемент массиву b.
simplify_postcondition: (AND (FORALL (k) (IMPLIES (AND (<= 0 k) (< k n)) (<= (select B k) m))) (EXISTS (k) (AND (<= 0 k) (< k n) (EQ (select B k) m))))
simplify_loop_invariant: (AND (<= (- 0 1) i) (< i (- n 1)) (FORALL (k) (IMPLIES (AND (< i k) (< k n)) (<= (select B k) m))) (EXISTS (k) (AND (< i k) (< k n) (EQ (select B k) m))))
